articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: T minus 35 hours as the transfer window reaches its interesting stage, as clubs make consider what their final options will be.  Celtic have an already bloated squad and are looking to offload in several areas, while hoping to add a left back, striker and possibly keeper. The left back requirement was originally for backup [...]
articles.title: T minus 35 hours

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC have knocked back a loan move for frozen-out midfielder James McCarthy. Greek Super League outfit Volos FC made a bid to take the Republic of Ireland international for the remainder of the season, but their offer fell short due to an issue over wages, according to a report in Sky Sports. The Hoops are [...]
articles.title: CELTIC ‘NO’ TO MIDFIELDER MOVE

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: DAVID TURNBULL has emerged as a shock transfer target for Championsip side Cardiff City. The Welsh outfit have contacted Celtic and it has been reported that talks are ongoing, according to Sky Sports. The champions could look to offload the Scotland international midfielder on a permanent move rather than allow him to leave on loan. A temporary [...]
articles.title: TURNBULL TARGETED

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: GUSTAF LAGERBIELKE is on the brink of a loan move to Serie A outfit Lecce. The Swedish central defender has failed to convince Brendan Rodgers since his £3million arrival from Elfsborg in the summer. The champions are keen for the international to get game-time which is ulikely at Parkhead with Cameron Carter-Vickers coming back to [...]
articles.title: GREEN LIGHT FOR GUSTAF

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC are stepping up talks to keep wonder Bhoy Rocco Vata at the champions. The 18-year-old winger is out of contract in the summer and can walk away for free, a situation that has alerted Serie A double-act Bologna and Como. The Italian sides could make a move before Thursday’s 11.30pm deadline with the Hoops [...]
articles.title: CELTIC STEP UP VATA TALKS

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: FORMER Celtic goal hero Frank McAvennie reckons Brendan Rodgers will be “going off his head” at the lack of transfer activity at the champions. The Hoops have signed just one player – £3million winger Nicolas Kuhn from Rapid Vienna – in this window with the deadline due at 11.30pm on Thursday. It has been strangely quiet [...]

articles.description: MIKEY JOHNSTON is poised to quit Celtic for the second time in two years. The Republic of Ireland international winger, who spent last season on loan at Portuguese top-flight outfit Vitoria Guimaraes, is ready for another switch before Thursday’s transfer deadline. Johnston looks to be heading for the English Championship with Norwich City now set [...]
articles.title: MIKEY ON THE MOVE

articles.description: THOMAS ROGNE was seen as one for the future when he was signed by Tony Mowbray on a free from Norwegian club Stabaek in January 2010. The 19-year-old 6ft 4in centre-back agreed a three-and-a-half-year deal at the Parkhead side and was unexpectedly handed a first-team appearance only three weeks after arriving in Scotland. Rogne made [...]
articles.title: WHATEVER HAPPENED TO…THOMAS ROGNE?

articles.description: Celtic responded to consecutive league defeats last month in decisive fashion, with authoritative wins against Livingston, Dundee, Newco, St Mirren and Buckie Thistle.  The record books will show another win on Saturday against Ross County, but the champions lacked even modest authority. After their capitulation at home to Partick Thistle in the Scottish Cup a [...]

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC legend Davie Hay celebrates his 76th birthday today. Hay was the man responsible for getting the bargain £650,000 deal for iconic Swede Henrik Larsson over the line in July [...]

articles.description: BRENDAN RODGERS is remaining tight-lipped on incoming and outgoings as the clocks ticks towards the 11.30pm transfer deadline on Thursday. The Celtic boss, whose only recruit so far in this window has been German winger Nicolas Kuhn at £3million from Rapid Vienna, is refusing to get involved in conjecture and speculation as names are bandied around. It took a [...]
